actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Amendments of 1983 to provide that the amendment therein relating to off-budget treatment for certain social security trust funds which is effective for fiscal years after fiscal year 1992 shall be effective for fiscal years after fiscal year 1986.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Social Security Amendments of 1983 to accelerate the removal from the unified budget of the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund, the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund, and the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Amendments of 1983 to provide that the amendment therein relating to off-budget treatment for certain social security trust funds which is effective for fiscal years after fiscal year 1992 shall be effective for fiscal years after fiscal year 1986.
